title: Monday.com Pricing Details: Basic, Standard, Pro, and Enterprise Plans
content: Monday.com offers several pricing plans, including Basic, Standard, Pro, and Enterprise, in addition to a free plan. The pricing is typically per seat per month, with discounts often available for annual billing. The Basic Plan costs around $9 per seat per month when billed annually and is designed for small teams needing to manage their work in one place. It includes unlimited items, unlimited boards, 5 GB file storage, and prioritized customer support, but has limitations in dashboard capabilities and storage. The Standard Plan, often the most popular, costs approximately $12 per seat per month annually and is suitable for growing teams requiring comprehensive project management tools. It includes Basic features plus timeline & Gantt views, calendar view, guest access, and 250 automations and integrations per month, allowing dashboards to combine up to 5 boards. The Pro Plan, priced at about $19 per seat per month annually, is tailored for larger teams with more complex workflows. It includes all Standard features, along with private boards and docs, chart view, time tracking, formula and dependency columns, and 25,000 automations and integrations per month, with dashboards combining up to 10 boards. The Enterprise Plan offers custom pricing and is for organizations seeking enterprise-grade features, security, and customization. It includes all Pro plan features, plus enterprise-scale automations and integrations, tailored onboarding, and advanced security and governance. These tiered plans highlight monday.com's approach to providing scalable solutions for various business sizes and requirements, from basic task management to comprehensive enterprise-level project management with advanced features and security.
